quotes.quote: Always laugh when you can, it is cheap medicine.

When you got a condition, it's bad to forget your medicine.

Think of exercise as medicine and take your daily prescription.
Medicine is as close to love as it is to science, and its relationships matter even at the edge of life itself.
Medicine is not a book but mind, not a business but life.
Medicine is a science of uncertainty and an art of probability.
There is no medicine like hope, no incentive so great, and no tonic so powerful as expectation of something tomorrow.
